block.title: Graphite Output
block.text: Configuration settings for Splunk Graphite Output App:

input.label: Metric Namespace
input.text: [Optional, Default=splunk.search] Prepended to Metric name. For Example: NAMESPACE.metric

input.label: Metric Prefix
input.text: [Optional] Metric Prefix, will be prepended to Metric Namespace. Useful for services like Hosted Graphite. For Example: PREFIX.NAMESPACE.metric

input.label: Namefield
input.text: [Optional] Prepend the metric name with the value of this field. For Example: NAMESPACE.200.metric
